titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that there should be established a "Free Enterprise Education Week" to encourage schools and businesses to educate students about the free enterprise system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization.

bill.summary: 7/24/2003--Introduced. Declares the sense of the Congress that a Free Enterprise Education Week should be established to encourage schools and businesses in the United States to educate students about the free enterprise system.
